name: Sunny Miami
description:
Avoid the sun and hide in comfort shade zones to not get damage. Your abilities can help you, but they will cost some health.

When you have full hp you can kill enemies only from their back, when you are weak you can kill them normal way. 

Somehow we deleted our tutorial level, so here’s the list of abilities to use:

E - fog, creates smoke that protects from the sun and stops enemies (-30HP)

Q - Into the dark. You become invisible and protected but not able to attack (-70HP)

LSHIFT - Dash. Dodge some projectiles or run from enemies (-5HP)
